casebody.data:
In re ADOPTION OF ANDERSON. No. 448PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 2, 2005. Bobby D. Mills, Raleigh, for Unidentified Adoptive Parents.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of August 2005 by Respondent for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent (Michael Avery) shall have up to and including the 7th day of September 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of August 2005."
